long_description: This stainless-steel plate kit allows fast conversion from riding mode to touring mode without having to split your SD board halves. Binding kit is compatible with most hardshell mountaineering and alpine touring or randonee boots. Features toe-throw lever for easy entry and exit. Weighs 21 oz.
short_description: This stainless-steel plate kit allows fast conversion from riding mode to touring mode without having to split your SD board halves.
